From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2023 Indian filmSergeantOfficial PosterDirected byPrawaal RamanWritten byPrawaal RamanProduced byAjay RaiJyoti DeshpandeMohit ChhabraStarringRandeep HoodaAdil HussainArun GovilSapna PabbiSonia GoswamiXavi NixonCinematographyBenjamin EdgarJames AlfredJim EdgarEdited byPraveen AngreMusic byAman Pant Tushar LallProductioncompaniesJAR Pictures Jio StudiosDistributed byJioCinemaRelease date30 June 2023Running time104 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Sergeant is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language thriller film written and directed by Prawaal Raman. It stars Randeep Hooda, Adil Hussain, Arun Govil, Sapna Pabbi and Sonia Goswami .[1]


Plot[edit]
Nikhil Sharma is a dedicated and dedicated police officer. A risky case is driving him through an action-packed adventure, where the guilty must be found at all costs.

Cast[edit]
Randeep Hooda as Sergeant Nikhil Sharma/Nick
Adil Hussain as Inspector Haider Ali
Arun Govil as Nikhil's father
Daphne Alexander as Amy
Sapna Pabbi as Monica, Nikhil's lover
Clive Coen as Mark, Nick's attorney
AL Groves as Judge, Westminister Court
Tahir Ashraf as Abdul Akhtar, Kalim's father
Chandini Wilson as Faisa Akhtar, Kalim's mother
Fay Oshodi as Daniella, Nick's Psychiatrist
Lisa Lian as Eva Lee
Isha Khaira as Ruby
Jonas Siaulys as Ruby's Boyfriend
Richa Prakash as Waitress
Sonia Goswami as Doctor
Hiten Patel as policeman
Xavi Nixon as Young Nick
Soundtrack[edit]
Track listingNo.TitleLyricsMusicSinger(s)Length1."Quaid"Anupam SidhantTushar LallOsho Jain1:402."Bhatka Hua Dil"Akhil TiwariAman PantAman Pant2:22Total length:4:02
Release[edit]
The film was released on 30 June 2023 on JioCinema.[2][3]

Reception[edit]
Subhash K. Jha rated the film 3 stars out of 5 and wrote "It is also not very clear why Nikhil is so bitter about the world."[4]
Archika Khurana of The Times of India wrote "'Sergeant' an interesting viewing."[5]
A critic from OTTPlay felt the film is "amalgamation of an unbaked plot, lazy writing, and needless plot twists."[6] Amar Ujala rated the film 2.5 stars out of 5.[7]

Reference[edit]


^ "Sergeant Movie (2023) | Release Date, Review, Cast, Trailer, Watch Online at JioCinema". Gadgets 360. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ "Randeep Hooda unveils cop-drama 'Sergeant' official teaser". The Times of India. ANI. 23 June 2023. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ Prajapat, Sunidhi (30 June 2023). "Sergeant release date: When and where to watch Randeep Hooda's cop drama". OTTPlay. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ Jha, Subhash K. (3 July 2023). ""Sergeant: Randeep Hooda Plays The Unhappiest Cop In The Universe In This Dark Brooding Drama" – A Subhash K Jha Review". BollySpice.com. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ Khurana, Archika (30 June 2023). "Sergeant Review : Randeep Hooda stands out in this murder mystery". The Times of India. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ Prajapat, Sunidhi (30 June 2023). "Sergeant review: An amalgamation of unbaked plot and lazy writing". OTTPlay. Retrieved 4 July 2023.

^ पाल, निधि (1 July 2023). "प्रवाल रमन और रणदीप हुड्डा की एक और जुगलबंदी, सस्पेंस थ्रिलर में न सस्पेंस दिखा न थ्रिल". Amar Ujala (in Hindi). Retrieved 4 July 2023.
